item.title: About
item.description: Koki Kato is a software engineer in Japan. Interests Databases and distributed systems. Beatrice is a toy DBMS, which aims to be a simple but made as a distributed system like BigTable or HBase. Data structures. I published several modules/crates that provide succinct data structures (fid, louds, fm-index) and probabilistic data strucutres (apbf). Test generation. Congo is an experimental test generation framework for Go, which adopts concolic testing to generate test cases with higher test coverage.
